member.name: T:Apartment_application.Apartment_complex
member.summary: Contains data of whats avalible when creating an apartment. Also conatins the data of what the user have choosen.

member.name: F:Apartment_application.Apartment_complex.viewer_have_choosen
member.summary: Contains the data of what the user have choosen.

member.name: T:Apartment_application.Program
member.summary: Creates an object of Choices(). Object is then called with Start().

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Start
member.summary: Contains the steps where the user interacts in the termninal.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Choose_sizes
member.summary: Gives the user the options avalible.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Choose_additional
member.summary: Gives the user the extra options that comes with the choosen size.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Choose_kitchen_island
member.summary: Gives the option of what type of kitchen islands avalible and adds the choosen one to the dictonary in Apartment_complex.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.One
member.summary: Print out what the 1 room apartment comes with.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Two
member.summary: Print out what the 2 room apartment comes with.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Three
member.summary: Print out what the 3 room apartment comes with.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Four
member.summary: Print out what the 4 room apartment comes with.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Error
member.summary: If error occur, Error() is called and restarts the program.

member.name: M:Apartment_application.Choices.Print_dict
member.summary: Prints out the data from the Dictonary with the options the user has choosen.
